verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12392'>لٌ ل</tajweed>ِّكُلِّ هُمَزَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14633'>ةٍ ل</tajweed>ُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Будь проклят клеветник и тот, Кто за спиной злословит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِى جَمَعَ مَال<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14634'>اً و</tajweed>َعَدَّدَهُۥ
verses.translation: Тот, кто копит добро И в закрома его кладет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَحْسَبُ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ مَالَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَخْلَدَهُۥ
verses.translation: Надеясь, что богатства эти Навечно жизнь ему продлят

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَلَّا‌ۖ لَيُ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':14635'>نۢب</tajweed>َذَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ فِى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14636'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: Поистине, низвергнут будет он в аль хутамУ

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13858'>دْ</tajweed>رَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ٮٰ</tajweed>كَ مَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14637'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: Как объяснить тебе, Что значит "аль хутамА

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَارُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14638'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14639'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُوقَدَةُ
ٱلَّتِى تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':14640'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَفْــِٔدَةِ

إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهَا عَلَيْه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':14641'>ِم م</tajweed>ُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: И погребальным сводом стал для них

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى عَمَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':14642'>دٍ م</tajweed>ُّمَدَّدَةِۭ
